name: Radical Enforcer X
description:
Disclaimer: Its silly , its buggy and its really just plain bad but you might get a laugh out of it anyways. It needs A LOT OF WORK all around and I definitely bit off more than I could chew in a week (I believe its around 2000-2500 lines of code if you add it all up?) but I had a lot of fun, sure learned a lot, and can see major room for major improvements. Enjoy it for what it is lol. EDIT: It is at least "beatable" as in, you can get to the end of the level (the red flag) but that is all for now.

Watch a playthrough of it here:


Download link (executable, not project files): https://drive.google.com/open?id=1YIr6gIbY8bF24zeWKKEA9vHAf8oy-ucJ

***IMPORTANT!!!***

~~~ Current Bugs/Work-Arounds (Until I learn how to fix them) ~~~

*** Use "Fullscreen Mode" by clicking the blue box in the lower-right hand corner ***

** Use "Mouse/Keyboard" controls (listed on the title screen)

*** Use ` instead of "Esc" so that it doesn't exit you out of fullscreen mode ***

*** Use "L. Ctrl" instead of "L. Shft" so that your browser doesn't bring up unwanted menus ***
